extracted_playbook.title: Disable HTTP on LOYTEC Device
extracted_playbook.description: Disable HTTP on the LOYTEC device as recommended by LOYTEC's security hardening guide.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Firmware for CVE-2023-46381
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest firmware to harden permissions on LWEB projects.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Firmware for CVE-2023-46387 and CVE-2023-46389
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest firmware to protect registry.xml and dpal_config.zml by admin access.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patch for CVE-2023-46384
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the patch published in LINX Configurator.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade LINX Firmware for CVE-2023-46386 and CVE-2023-46388
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade LINX firmware to implement encrypted storage of SMTP credentials.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control Systems Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), recognizing VPNs may have vulnerabilities and should be updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA guidelines for more information on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
